column4: anyone else have gnome onscreen keyboard problems? i installed it, but it wont open.
says the registry is missing. shouldnt this be fixed before release? ;-)
can someone try intalling and running the onscreen keyboard (gok) for me.. its in the base packages..   im having problems getting it running
i think its called sessions.. lol..
there's something but with another error. try starting it from a terminal
hm but try installing "gcopernicus" helped for me :)
you're completely right. apt should take care of that, unfortunatly it didn't. lets hope the maintainer fixes it
if you search for gcopernicus in synaptic you can read more about it
